  .. index::

RO_0004035 - acts upstream of, negative effect
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for acts upstream of, negative effect

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    c 'acts upstream of, negative effect' p if c is enables f, and f is causally upstream of p, and the direction of f is negative


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    None
